name: RDT-Client
author: rogerfar
description: RDT-Client is a web interface to manage your torrents on Real-Debrid, AllDebrid, Premiumize, TorBox or DebridLink. It supports adding new torrents through magnets or files, downloading all files locally automatically, unpacking downloaded files, and implements a fake qBittorrent API for integration with applications like Sonarr, Radarr or Couchpotato.

form_fields.label: Real-Debrid API Key
form_fields.hint: Your Real-Debrid API key. Get it from https://real-debrid.com/apitoken

form_fields.label: AllDebrid API Key
form_fields.hint: Your AllDebrid API key (optional, if you use AllDebrid instead of Real-Debrid)

form_fields.label: Premiumize API Key
form_fields.hint: Your Premiumize API key (optional, if you use Premiumize instead of Real-Debrid)

form_fields.label: TorBox API Key
form_fields.hint: Your TorBox API key (optional, if you use TorBox instead of Real-Debrid)

form_fields.label: DebridLink API Key
form_fields.hint: Your DebridLink API key (optional, if you use DebridLink instead of Real-Debrid)

form_fields.label: Base Path
form_fields.hint: Base path for running in a subfolder (e.g., /rdt for https://myserver.com/rdt). Leave empty to run at root.

form_fields.label: Download Path
form_fields.hint: Path where downloads will be stored inside the container

form_fields.label: Mapped Path
form_fields.hint: Host path mapping for downloads (should match your volume mapping)

form_fields.label: Database Connection String
form_fields.hint: Custom database connection string (advanced users only)

form_fields.label: Download Speed Limit (MB/s)
form_fields.hint: Maximum download speed per download in MB/s (0 = unlimited)

form_fields.label: Parallel Connections
form_fields.hint: Number of parallel connections per download (recommended: 8 or less)
